riddles.question: I have a ring, but no hands. I used to be plugged into the wall but now I follow you every where. What am I?
What season does Humpty Dumpty hate the most?
I am black when clean and white when dirty. What am I?
What runs around a house but does not move?
Once you have it, you want to share it. Once you share it, you don’t have it. What is it?
I start with M and end with X. I have a never ending amount of letters. What am I?
What can elephants make that no other animals can make?
I have a head & no body, but I do have a tail. What am I?
What do you call a bear without an ear?
I can be made and I can be played. I can be cracked and I can be told. What am I?
What has a bed but doesn’ t sleep and a mouth but never eats ?
I am a container with no sides and no lid, yet golden treasure lays inside. What am I?
Which letter of the alphabet contains the most water?
What has a soul but doesn’t live and a tongue but can’t taste?
You buy me to eat, but never eat me. What am I?
The maker doesn’t want it, the buyer doesn’t use it and the user doesn’t know it. What is it?
You go at red and stop at green. What am I?
